alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Henderson; McDonough; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Warren, Henderson, western McDonough, eastern Hancock and northeastern Des Moines Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mediapolis to near West Burlington to Colusa to near West Point. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Carthage, Bowen, Carman, Gulf Port, and Burnside around 500 PM CDT. Oquawka, La Harpe, Gladstone, Terre Haute, and Disco around 505 PM CDT. Stronghurst and Augusta around 510 PM CDT. Blandinsville, Biggsville, and Rozetta around 515 PM CDT. Raritan, Tennessee, and Colmar around 520 PM CDT. Colchester, Kirkwood, and Little York around 525 PM CDT. Macomb, Sciota, and Fandon around 530 PM CDT. Monmouth, Roseville, Good Hope, and Western Illinois University around 535 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Lomax, Gerlaw, Macomb Municipal Airport, Shokokon, Larchland, Kingston, Monmouth Municipal Airport, Warren County Fairgrounds, Youngstown, and McDonough County 4-H Grounds. Those attending the Western Illinois University Football game are in the path of these storms and should prepare for IMMINENT DANGEROUS WEATHER CONDITIONS. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
